thread.title: Video: Liam Payne and Louis Tomlinson Accidentally Kiss During 1D Concert
thread.title_full: Video: Liam Payne and Louis Tomlinson Accidentally Kiss During 1D Concert

author: AceShowbiz.com
title: Video: Liam Payne and Louis Tomlinson Accidentally Kiss During 1D Concert
text:
Comments The two's lips seemed to briefly touch after they goofed around on the stage at the concert in Birmingham over the weekend. 
Liam Payne and Louis Tomlinson gave fans extra reason to freak out at One Direction 's recent concert in Birmingham. The two, who often goof around onstage, were caught on camera kissing during the show on Saturday, October 10. In a video taken and shared via Twitter by someone in the audience, Liam and Louis wrapped their hands around each other towards the end of the concert. Their lips appeared to briefly touch when they leaned in at the same time. The duo didn't seem to mind the smooch while fans went frenzy on Twitter. Most of them insisted that the two didn't kiss, but found the video hilarious anyway. "If we stop the video it really seems they kissed by accident by omg this is so funny, their faces. #lilokiss," one fan tweeted. So this is what y'all are saying was a kiss?? Lmao ��°ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ #lilokiss pic.twitter.com/SdRuQ7jSPZ — ��¢ï¿½ï¿½ ±���ï¿½���ï¿½���ï¿½ ±f ��¢ï¿½ï¿½ (@LarentsParadise) October 11, 2015 One Direction is currently on the European leg of their "On the Road Again" tour while gearing up to release their new album, " Made in the A.M. ". Marking their fifth studio effort, and their first without former bandmate Zayn Malik , the project is due out on November 13. They're going to battle for the No. 1 spot on the charts against Justin Bieber , who's dropping his own LP " Purpose " on the same day.
